translation.4102484666: Ensure the Security of the Marine Transportation Route!
translation.3426280930:
I'm Seaplane Tender Akitsushima!
Make sure to remember me along with this Taitei-chan, alright!
translation.330514506:
Unryuu class aircraft carrier, Unryuu, has arrived.
Admiral, it's nice to meet you.
translation.4222124470: Form a fleet consisting of ships that excel at anti-submarine warfare and in anti-aircraft capabilities, and protect the transport ship routes!
translation.4000806670: The approach of a powerful enemy task force has been confirmed in southern waters. Form a carrier task force and intercept it!
translation.3415646862: With a high-speed fleet of only Destroyers, rush the enemy-infested waters around Kis Island and assist the garrison there!
translation.1836283434:
I'm the girl who went on a diet and became an aircraft carrier, Chitose. Somehow I even got faster.
Is this is real me, I wonder?
translation.2523202175:
The second ship of the Vittorio Veneto-class battleships, Littorio.
I have confidence in my speed and firepower. Nice to meet ya ~
translation.3295516659:
Second of the Furutaka-class heavy cruisers, Kako here.
Let's get along!
translation.496174362: Beat the 2-3 boss with Asashio, Michishio, Ooshio, and Arashio.
translation.1027270501: Break through the enemy picket line in the Western Curry Ocean and destroy the core of the enemy fleet off the coast of Casgadama!
translation.402306802: Defeat the flagship of an enemy fleet.
translation.931933936:
Yes... I am Taihou.
Thank you for your reception, Admiral...
I shall bring victory to you and your fleet!
translation.3016720630: An enemy flagship must be destroyed!
translation.2969291247: Ten enemy fleets must be destroyed!
translation.4076966897: The Forefront of the Southern Sea
translation.13968469: Deploy a fleet with a heavy cruiser as its flagship.
translation.3506120646: Perform 2 successful modernizations within the same day.
translation.3005185623:
Super-dreadnought Fusou-class, the elder Fusou here.
Please take care of me along with my sister Yamashiro.
translation.3156659497: Beat the 2-2 boss with Atago, Takao, Choukai, and Maya!
translation.2878036938: I'm Kiso. I'll bestow upon you the undeniably best victory.
translation.77367901: Eliminate the enemy fleet and transport bauxite from Bashi Island!
translation.687753534:
Hello! I-58 here!
You can call me Goya. I won't be bitter!
translation.2177834804:
You're the Admiral? I see. Anyway...
Second of the Ise-class battleships, Hyuuga. Remember me, if you will.
translation.1825681793: Sortie Arare, Kagerou, Kasumi, Shiranui +2 extra ships to World 3-1 and defeat the Boss.
translation.1621283560: A powerful enemy battlegroup is invading the waters around Okinoshima Island. Sail out in full force and annihilate them!
translation.3970477202: We are Hatsuharu. We thank you in advance.
translation.2133504104: There are reports of an enemy counteroffensive. Form a cruiser patrol group and track their movements!
translation.1749890828:
Nagatsuki here.
Don't make light of us destroyers. We're useful.
translation.3019245827:
Shiranui here.
I look forward to your guidance and encouragement.
translation.2692203334:
Second of the Nagato-class battleships, Mutsu here. Pleased to meet you.
Don't play with fire too much, okay? Please...
translation.1068431451: Crush the Core of the Enemy's Eastern Fleet!
translation.3277557421:
Light aircraft carrier Shouhou, at your service.
I realize that I'm a little small, but please make a place for me in your fleet!
translation.4131213102: Organize a Light Surface Counterattack Fleet！
translation.295108834: Sortie Maya (Kai or Kai-2), 1 CL, and 2 DD (+ 2 ships) to World 2-3 and obtain an S-Rank at the boss
translation.3245638661: Contains a small amount of furniture coins.
translation.182242884: Establish naval supremacy in the Southwestern Islands waters!
translation.4237956: Have Sendai, Jintsuu, and Naka in your main fleet.
translation.3634399684:
Carrier Ryuuhou, remodeled from a Submarine Tender.
I'll once again try my best as a carrier!
translation.1764270028: Deploy the New Standard Aircraft Carrier Class!
translation.95891596:
My name is Mogami.
It's all right, I won't run into anyone this time, really!
translation.1718499952:
I'm Katori, a Training Cruiser.
Don't you worry... I'll be gentle in teaching you various things.
translation.1220154293:
Ooi here, reborn as a heavy torpedo cruiser!
Long time no see!
translation.3167368147:
I'm Shoukaku, the first of the Shoukaku-class carriers.
I will try my best with Zuikaku to try and live up to the names of my seniors
in the first and second aviation divisions.
translation.506897920:
Good morning!
I'm the heavy cruiser Prinz Eugen. Nice to meet you! ！
translation.1340206400: Three enemy transports must be destroyed!
translation.3220823665: Good day, Admiral. I'm the second ship of the special submarine class, I-401, new and improved version.
translation.2202464629: Have Hiryuu Kai Ni as flagship, Souryuu and 2 destroyers in your fleet.
translation.3266977632: A set of marriage papers and ring that allows you to marry the ship of your choice
translation.3117953171:
I'm the Ayanami-class destroyer Oboro.
I won't lose to anyone... probably...
translation.1382440116:
You can call me Fumizuki.
Nice to meet you~
translation.1195199273:
Excuse me. Second of the Yamato-class battleships here, Musashi.
What do you say? This color of dress looks good on me, doesn't it?
translation.4118310601:
Akigumo, reporting for duty!
Look after me, Admiral!
translation.4031513405:
Hi hi! I'm the Shiratsuyu-class destroyer Murasame!
Everyone, nice to meet you!
translation.326035042: Allows an equipped ship to avoid sinking once.
translation.899706573: Have Fusou, Yamashiro, Mogami, Shigure, Michishio in your main fleet.
translation.3561821443:
Good morning! It's the remodelled Taihou!
Reinforced deck armor! Even higher defence! An increase in planes to boost my air wing just for you, admiral!
translation.3239168816:
Gives 1 Key
(Unlocks 1 Repair Dock OR 1 Construction Slot)
translation.1858176696: Deploy a heavy cruiser task force!
translation.1419183712: Have 3 submarines in your main fleet.
translation.696794260: Enhance the Use of Aviation Firepower!
translation.3789109318: Organize a second carrier task force!
translation.4259345360:
Unryuu class aircraft carrier, Unryuu, has arrived.
Admiral, let me handle the New Taskforce. ！
translation.3722030772:
Have 3 either of the Nagato/Fusou/Ise/Yamato class and 1 Light Cruiser in your main fleet.
Fleet must have ONLY 3 BB and 1 CL in order to complete.
translation.987200806:
I've... come again, to these seas.
Yuugumo-class destroyer, Hayashimo... reporting for duty.
translation.3300759035: Have both Tenryuu and Tatsuta in your main fleet.
translation.124298339: Deploy to World 1-2 and beat the boss.
translation.543161873: An enemy aircraft carrier must be destroyed!
translation.983587351:
I'm Amagi, an Unryuu-class Carrier!
Admiral, this time Amagi can play an active role!
translation.4092536298: I'm Repair ship Akashi. If you take a little damage, I can fix you up in the base. Just leave it to me!
translation.247892867: Operation A-Go: The Fleet's Decisive Battle
translation.1465796473: Have only Akagi, Kaga, Hiryuu, and Souryuu in your main fleet.
translation.3886780720: Have a light cruiser as your flagship and complete the fleet with destroyers.
translation.956812105:
My name is Samidare! I look forward to working with you.
Please leave any escort missions to me!
translation.751740480:
You are my commander?
I am Nachi. I appreciate your contribution.
translation.884243221: Have Shoukaku and Zuikaku in your main fleet with 2 destroyers.
translation.3978674679:
Pleased to meet you.
Second of the Tone-class heavy cruisers, Chikuma here.
translation.3795635100:
The fleet's idol, Naka here!
Nice to meet you!
translation.1814960664: Yo! Name's Maya, nice to meet you.
translation.2423637906: Have a Level 100 Ship as your Flagship along with five others in your Main Fleet.
translation.2532929291: Admiral, I've attained a new form!
translation.1971651110:
Sendai has arrived.
Please leave the night battles to me.
translation.3514587665: (Continuation) Enhance the Use of Aviation Firepower
translation.2174457417:
Lead ship of the Yamato-class battleships, Flagship Yamato.
Heading forth!
translation.3371955053: I-168 here. What, is that too hard? Okay, just call me Imuya. Nice to meet you!
translation.2663062072: Okay~, thanks for waiting! The experimental armament cruiser Yuubari has arrived!
translation.956292269: You MUST deploy to World 6-1, and obtain an S-rank victory at the boss node 3 times.
translation.504926536: Contains a large amount of furniture coins.
translation.1578310828: Organize a battleship and heavy cruiser fleet!
translation.1926014614: Second Battle of the Solomon Sea
translation.1163453536: Deploy a fleet with a battleship as its flagship.
translation.656226470:
Is the microphone's volume fine? Check, 1, 2...
Alright. How do you do, I'm Kirishima.
translation.1335444779:
Good day, Admiral. I'm I-401, the second ship in my special submarine series.
Just call me Shioi!
translation.2150300704: Clamp down on the enemy convoy!
translation.1906956294:
Guten Tag... Ah, my mistake, sorry.
Please, call me Hachi.
translation.1660227753:
I'm Suzuya! What a lively fleet this is!
I'll be in your care!
translation.3794751683:
Fast battleship Haruna, reporting for duty.
You're the admiral, correct? Please take good care of me.
translation.2253033470: Have 2 heavy cruisers in your fleet.
translation.3385491553: The Oriental enemy forces have received a major blow by our fleet and are currently regathering at the Ri-Lanka Island harbour. Organise a military raid unit and destroy the enemy reinforcements!
translation.1455626330:
Good day.
I am Bismarck, the nameship of the Bismarck-class battleships.
You should remember it well.
translation.952087724: We are undertaking operations to control the Curry Ocean. Secure the mines and incapacitate the enemy fleet!
translation.3967500265:
I'm the aircraft carrier Souryuu.
Count me in when you need to assemble a carrier task force!
translation.1270697153: Sortie to World 1-5 and get at least an A-rank at the boss node 3 times.
translation.3644841214: Defeat either the 3-3, 3-4 or 3-5 boss 5 times.
translation.806297467: Do equipment modernization 1 time (failure is ok)
translation.1130240328:
Merchant ship turned aircraft carrier, Junyou here~!
Waha~
translation.1066368251:
Greetings, I'm Mikuma.
I wonder where Mogami could be hiding?
translation.1517237755:
12th Kagerou-class destroyer, Isokaze.
Don't worry, I will protect you.
translation.2725015877:
Yo! I'm Asashimo, 16th Destroyer of the Yuugumo Class. Please remember.
Don't forget about me... ok?
translation.436206296: Deploy 1-3 Light Cruisers, one as the flagship, and 3-5 Destroyers to World 1-4, and obtain an S-rank victory at the boss node.
translation.361408965: The Eastern enemy fleets must be destroyed!
translation.43635503:
I'm Hibi-- Verniy.
That name refers to the meaning of "reliance".
translation.2536074425: Have only Akatsuki, Hibiki, Ikazuchi, and Inazuma, in your main fleet.
translation.3704208373:
Developed after the Hatsuharu-class destroyer, Shiratsuyu-class, number one, I'm Shiratsuyu! Yeah, number one, the first ship!
With lots of upgrades, I'm a true fleet destroyer, you know!
Eh? 'Don't be in such a rush that you'll hit a tanker'? Don't worry about it!
translation.1529735316: Deploy a fleet consisting of a carrier flagship, and 5 CL/DDs.
translation.3311567325:
The girl that became an aircraft carrier, Chiyoda here.
Of course, I'll be assigned to my sister Chitose's fleet, yes?
translation.1450577699: Nachi as the flagship, Hatsushimo, Kasumi, Ushio, Akebono. World 2-2, S-rank victory at the boss node.
translation.605421769: Have Myoukou, Nachi, Ashigara, and Haguro in your main fleet.
translation.905466377:
I'm Isuzu. Leave the torpedo squadrons to me.
I'll bring victory to the Admiral with all my power. Pleased to meet you!
translation.2669558709:
Lead ship of the Yuugumo-class destroyers, Yuugumo, has arrived.
Admiral, it's fine to spoil me, you know.
translation.3355918840: Advance the Nishimura Fleet to the Southern Sea!
translation.3226943684:
My name is Izumo Ma— wait, Hiyou.
I'm an aircraft carrier. Pleased to meet you, Admiral!
translation.3903793703:
Increases your ship capacity by 10 and your equipment capacity by 40!
(can only be bought 15 times)
translation.4116478799:
Hi, I'm Ashigara. My specialty is surface combat.
Nice to meet you.
translation.1800039644: Expand to the forward part of the MS Archipelago sea, seize the enemy fleet that is slowly advancing to capture the archipelago, and destroy them with all your might!
translation.598523563: Have Kasumi as flagship, Ashigara, 1 Light Cruiser, and 3 Destroyers in your main fleet
translation.2753706370:
Good morning~~
asashio-class destroyer Sixth ship Yamagumo～
Please treat me well! ～
translation.790313895: Have Choukai, Aoba, Kako, Furutaka, Tenryuu, and a fast ship.
translation.671668934:
Pyan♪ The fourth Agano class Light Cruiser, Sakawa!
Commander, nice to meet you!
translation.1757921482: Have Hiei, Kirishima, Nagara, Akatsuki, Ikazuchi, and Inazuma in your main fleet!
translation.2200412114: Enter Orel Bay and destroy the enemy transport fleet while protecting our own supply lines!
translation.3139229898:
Special-type destroyer, 'Akebono'.
Hey! Don't look at me, you dirty Admiral!
translation.3075899122: Deploy Haguro, Myoukou, and Nachi to World 2-5, and obtain an S-rank victory at the boss node.
translation.184643100: Obtain the four Kongou-class fast battleships sisters!
translation.1593608676: There is a movement of enemy reinforcements to the northern sea. Dispatch a medium size fleet, intercept the enemy reinforcements and destroy it!
translation.3971243756:
I am Tone!
With my addition to the fleet, there'll be no problems in scouting out the enemy!
translation.649858060: Three enemy aircraft carriers must be destroyed!
translation.1645092519:
Submarine RO500, formerly U-boat U-511.
I'm Ro, formerly called Yuu!
Admiral? I will be in your care！
translation.2972827399:
2nd of the Shoukaku-class aircraft carriers, the younger sister Zuikaku.
The lucky carrier, you say? That's not it, I just fight with all my might.. As long as I have planes, I won't lose!
translation.729352360: H-Hello, I'm Abukuma, a light cruiser.
translation.1832427021:
Second of the Shoukaku-class aircraft carriers, I'm the younger sister Zuikaku.
The lucky carrier, you say? That's not it, I just try my hardest...
As long as I have planes, I wont lose!
translation.3005613589: Sortie the New Mikawa Fleet to the Solomon Waters!
translation.2446853327:
Hibiki here.
I'm often referred to as "The Phoenix" due to my exploits.
translation.89086556: Have a battleship and 2 heavy cruisers in your main fleet.
translation.3479230116:
I'm the 4th battleship of the Vittorio Veneto-class, Roma. Nice to meet you.
What? Please don't stare at me, okay?
translation.2192939382:
Protect and Recover Ship from Sinking
(Gives 1 Repair Goddess)
translation.3627624050:
I am the battleship Nagato. Pleased to meet you.
Just leave the enemy battleships to me.
translation.3068128640:
Destroyer Ooshio reporting in!
Big torpedoes on a small body! No worries!
translation.3307359230:
I'm the light cruiser Kitakami.
Nice ta meet 'ya.
translation.1812233126: Organize a light cruiser task force!
translation.2049516104:
I tried improving my air presence, indeed.
Now I am a carrier... Indeed...
translation.1806299611: Have Nachi, Ashigara, Tama, and Kiso in your main fleet.
translation.3461347405:
I'm the aviation battleship Ise!
With a rear-facing flight deck and 2 catapult launchers, I can make use of the power of aviation!
translation.1180188217:
My name is Natori...
I'll do my best not to cause you any trouble!
translation.435929892:
We meet at last! I'm Kagerou.
Treat me well!
translation.2658148830:
Hello! Last of the Yuugumo-class, it's Kiyoshimo!
I'm a bit late, but I'll be in your care!
translation.3251857731: Attain 20 victories in training within the same week.
translation.563031676:
My name is Kisaragi.
Please keep me at your side.
translation.4043448793: An enemy invasion fleet is pressing on the defensive line in the Nansei Islands. Sail out in full force and destroy them!
translation.3639219842: Sortie Mutsuki, Mochizuki, Uzuki, and Yayoi to 1-5 obtain C-Rank or better at boss node
translation.1509509027:
Yuugumo-class destroyer, Makigumo here.
I'll follow my sister Yuugumo's example and do my best!
translation.1866810879: Have Furutaka, Kako, Aoba, and Kinugasa in your main fleet.
translation.1381691037: Have Myoukou Kai Ni in your fleet as flagship.
translation.3492468291: Beat the 2-3 boss with Fusou, Yamashiro, Mogami, and Shigure.
translation.2723837709:
We meet again, Admiral. It's me, Mogami.
How's my flight deck? Does it suit me?
translation.1803866060: Sortie Hiryuu (Kai-2) as flagship, Souryuu (Kai or Kai-2), and 2 Destroyers (you may add additional ships) to World 5-2 and obtain an S-Rank at the boss
translation.2140249275:
Light Cruiser Yahagi, reporting for duty.
Let's do our best to the end, Admiral!
translation.1774409677:
Hello. I'm light cruiser Ooi.
Pleased to make your acquaintance.
translation.2770690233: Have a submarine tender as flagship with 4 submarines or more in your fleet.
translation.631277027:
I'm the aircraft carrier Akagi.
If you need a mobile carrier squadron, just leave everything to me.
translation.409742460: Sir, please let Maruyu keep working hard.
translation.2270487850:
Light aircraft carrier, Ryuujou here! Ain't my silhouette distinctive?
Regardless, launching planes one after another makes me a proper carrier, ya know! Just count on me!
translation.155878700: Naval Base adjacent waters anti-submarine patrol
translation.1708208076: Craft 3 pieces of equipment. (Failures are OK)
translation.254467085: Form an air fleet to destroy the enemy home port of Ri Lanka!
translation.4132968994: Have 2 submarines in your main fleet.
translation.3828317481:
Drop of oil ... fuel shortage resolved!
(Recovers 1000 Fuel)
translation.81507296:
I'm Kasumi.
What are we waiting for? Come on!
translation.1290891883: Deploy 3 Slow battleships and 1 light cruiser to World 5-1 and obtain an S-rank victory.
translation.1733553329:
Asashio-class destroyer, Asagumo, reporting in!
So you're the Commander... huh. Hmm. Well, it's fine. I'll do it !
translation.3918516442: Win 5 training matches within the same day.
translation.305306003:
As the first step of the Western strategy, carry out an operation to capture Jam Island!
(Take Anti-Submarine Precautions)
translation.2787734205: Organize the main battleship force: The 2nd Squadron!
translation.516198276: Engage in a daring night raid against the enemy fleet. Your goal is to destroy the transport they are escorting!
translation.3668319142: Defeat the Boss in 4-3 with a Level 100+ Flagship. (S Rank)
translation.2099809251: Sink 3 enemy aircraft carriers. (light carriers are fine too)
translation.1020289469: A Thorough 6th Destroyer Division Anti-Submarine Patrol!
translation.191059606: Obtain the three Sendai-class light cruiser sisters!
translation.788919628:
Ikazuchi here! Don't read my name as Kaminari!
I'll quiz you later!
translation.3071347309: Have Kongou, Hiei, Haruna, and Kirishima in your main fleet.
translation.3609751816: Deploy a fleet consisting of seaplane tenders equipped with flying boats or recon planes, light cruisers and destroyers, and carry out the aerial scout mission "Operation K"!
translation.1785813101:
Protect Ship from Sinking
(Gives 1 Repair Team)
translation.2926718527:
I'm Amagi, an Unryuu-class Carrier.
Thanks for your recruitment, Admiral.
Amagi will concentrate!
translation.4156319117:
I am Akitsumaru, indeed.
Thank you for taking me into your fleet.
translation.1590299360:
Is a nice breeze coming?
It's time for me, the next generation
destroyer prototype, Amatsukaze, to debut.
translation.3630391813:
Destroyer, Hamakaze.
Henceforth I shall be attached to your fleet.
translation.2272484332:
Hello!
I'm the latest light cruiser, Agano. Teehee.
translation.1082644709:
Aircraft carrier, Kaga here.
Are you my admiral? ...I have faith in you.
translation.1327713033: Perform 10 successful expeditions within the same day.
translation.3577611791: Sortie Akatsuki, Hibiki/Верный, Ikazuchi, Inazuma to World 1-5 and obtain C-Rank or better at the boss.
translation.3994326747: Have Akatsuki(Kai-2) as flagship with Hibiki/Верный, Ikazuchi, Inazuma in your main fleet.
translation.2041513802:
I'm Haguro, the youngest of the Myoukou-class heavy cruiser sisters.
U-Um... I'm sorry!
translation.509390416: Scrap Equipment 2 times to express your love.
translation.232766189: Advance into Northern waters and patrol the Moray Sea!
translation.289817296:
Hello, it's Nenohi!
I hope my name wasn't too hard to read, yes?
translation.1677291778: Have Fusou, Yamashiro, Mogami, and Shigure in your main fleet.
translation.2980754680: Beat the 4-2 boss with two BBVs and two CAVs.
translation.187096248:
Good day.
I am the Destroyer Max Schultz
But, Max is fine. Pleased to meet you.
translation.1433799619:
Akashi's Improvement Arsenal Repair Pack
(Gives 10 Improvement Materials)
translation.2062627073: Complete Expedition 37 or 38 a total of 7 times in a week.
translation.3133410426: Participate in 3 training matches within the same day.
translation.1160228489:
Lead ship of the Yamato-class battleships, Flagship Yamato.
AA guns have been greatly improved!
translation.1216704446: I'm here I'm here! Kinu has finally arrived!
translation.1545593470: OTO 152mm Trip Rapid Fire Gun Mount
translation.408926878:
Arare....
I won't say 'ncha-'... Look after me...
translation.2573325224:
I'm the British-born returnee, Kongou!
Nice to meet you!
translation.3145007425: Have Souryuu Kai Ni as flagship with Hiryuu Kai Ni and 2 Destroyers in your fleet.
translation.2452387460: Have both Ise and Hyuuga in your main fleet.
translation.126221847: Have Nagato, Mutsu, Fusou and Yamashiro in your main fleet.
translation.1605665944:
Nice to meet you, I'm Tatsuta~
I hope Tenryuu hasn't been causing you trouble~
translation.1046276014:
5th Shiratsuyu-class destroyer, Harusame, yes.
Leave the transport missions to me... desu.
translation.3272046788: Have only 2 aviation battleships and 2 aviation cruisers in your main fleet.
translation.2641248502:
Affordable Sortie Pack
(Gives 500 Fuel, 500 Ammo, 200 Steel and 2 Instant Repairs)
translation.3566387895:
Admiral, Light Cruiser Ooyodo has joined the battle lines.
Please leave the fleet administration & supervision to me.
translation.643191694: Perform a vital "rat transport" operation. If possible, also destroy the enemy fleet in the area!
translation.564092036: Contains a medium amount of furniture coins.
translation.3815990069: Sortie Mutsuki, Kisaragi, Mochizuki, Yayoi, +2DD to 3-2 and obtain C-Rank or better at boss node
translation.4146591572: Have both Fusou and Yamashiro in your main fleet.
translation.3241451769:
I'm happy to see that you're such a great Admiral.
I'm I-19. Please call me Iku!
translation.2397037377: S-rank the 2-3 boss with Furutaka, Kako, Kinugasa, and Aoba.
translation.459702487:
My name is Верный.
I'm often referred to as "The Phoenix" due to my exploits.
translation.2733331437: Have a flagship in your second fleet.
translation.3557671588: 1 CA 1 CL 4 DD. Flagship MUST be DD. World 2-5, obtain an S-Rank victory at the boss node.
translation.2454744987:
The fourth ship in the Hatsuharu-class, Hatsushimo.
Everybody, very pleased to meet you!
translation.3263198955:
Yayoi, reporting for duty...
Pleased to meet you. Please don't be too concerned about me...
translation.2627531043:
Oh, I haven't introduced myself yet?
I'm Arashio.
translation.2866966859: Akatsuki(Kai2), Hibiki/Verniy, Ikazuchi, Inazuma to World 1-5, get A-Rank or better at Boss.
translation.1380257152: Deploy with only Akatsuki, Hibiki, Ikazuchi, and Inazuma in your fleet.
translation.1640810678: Have an aircraft carrier and 3 destroyers in your second fleet.
translation.1171356294: An enemy fleet must be destroyed!
translation.2117327407:
Instant Repair Pack
(Gives 5 Fast Repair Material)
translation.2522890410:
My name is Tenryuu.
Heh, ya scared?
translation.88088106: I'm THE Naganami, fourth of the Yuugumo-class destroyers. Off we go! Yeah!
translation.1275389550: Win 2 Training Match to express your love.
translation.493155115: Have ONLY Mutsuki, Yayoi, Uzuki, and Mochizuki in your main fleet
translation.893406: Choukai(Kai2) as flag, any of Furutaka/Kako/Aoba/Kinugasa/Yuubari/Tenryuu, World5-1, S-Rank at Boss.
translation.3440780293:
I'm Shigure, of the Shiratsuyu-class destroyers.
Nice to meet you.
translation.1842125054: Deploy Shoukaku and Zuikaku to 3-1 and beat the boss.
translation.2142823284:
I'm Myoukou, nameship of the Myoukou-class heavy cruisers.
Let's work together.
translation.1799111315: Obtain the Myoukou-class heavy cruiser sisters!
translation.1975372555:
Super-dreadnought, 1st of the Ise-class, Ise.
Setting off!
translation.1753503445: Have Abukuma, Akebono, Ushio, Kasumi and Shiranui in your fleet.
translation.4095183426:
I'm Yura, the fourth Nagara-class light cruiser.
Pleased to make your acquaintance!
translation.2270106801:
Chitose here. I'm the first Japanese seaplane tender.
Nice to meet you!
translation.194263487: Sortie 36 times, meet 24 bosses, defeat 12 bosses, and get 6 S ranks.
translation.2006162402:
So you're the commander, huh?
Well, you've better try your damn best.
translation.3814836917:
Yo! I'm Asashimo, 16th Destroyer of the Yuugumo Class.
Please remember. Don't forget about me... ok?
translation.521192604: Mobilize for a patrol of the waters outside the naval base!
translation.2642850710:
You're the commander, right? I'm Mikazuki.
I hope you welcome me warmly into your fleet.
translation.2424531538: The 6th Destroyer Division Anti-Submarine Patrol nanodesu!
translation.1650528021:
Aircraft carrier, Houshou here.
Though I'm inexperienced, I look forward to your guidance.
translation.2179053505: 2 CV, 2 DD and additional 2 ships to 4-2. You must reach the boss an achieve S-rank Victory.
translation.2299681592: Sortie to World 5-2 and get an S-Rank at the boss node 2 times.
translation.1286053887:
Nice to meet you! I'm Fubuki!
Thanks for having me!
translation.4219101123:
Nagato class' 2nd ship and from there, Mutsu.
Of course, I'm part of the world's big 7.
Ehh? The gunpowder explosion accident?
Well, can't cover it up anymore right? This time will be fine!
translation.441233019: Organize a heavy cruiser task force!
translation.1261836169: Deploy with a light cruiser as flagship and 3 destroyers.
translation.704765504: Have all four Kongou-class Kai Ni in your main fleet.
translation.1077719770:
A brand new Kitakami... that's me, all right.
I feel a lot more grown up, loaded to the brim with oxygen torpedos.
translation.1304906159: Obtain the two Tenryuu-class light cruiser sisters!
translation.1757902093:
I'm Hatsukaze, nice to meet you.
Admiral, how many did you have before me, I wonder?
translation.1473050178: Have Unryuu in your Main fleet as flagship
translation.3849339975:
I'm the 6th of the Yuugumo-class destroyers, Takanami.
E-ehm, I will do my best! Really, probably!
translation.403966902: Have only Mutsuki, Kisaragi, Yayoi, and Mochizuki in your fleet.
translation.3268026147:
Um... I'm light cruiser Jintsuu...
Pleased to meet you...
translation.1206998097: Create a diverse surface fleet to expand into the southern sea area!
translation.4243080814:
I'm the special-type, Ayanami-class destroyer Ushio.
It would be nice to be dismissed soon...
translation.438464968:
I'm Michishio.
Why would I get assigned to your lousy fleet?
translation.368560495: Protect the supply lines from our coastal refineries!
translation.1164905677: Intercept the enemy's vanguard fleet in the seas off the Nansei Islands!
translation.753628775:
Dazzling the stage, Kinugasa here!
Take good care of Aoba and me!
translation.1615250048: Sea in Front of the Naval Base
translation.3360724164: Have Asashio, Michishio, Ooshio, and Arashio in your main fleet.
translation.2578880267: Adjacent Seas of the Naval Base
translation.272486148:
A fine day to you, sir.
I am called Kumano, a heavy cruiser.
translation.3461316404: It's me, Urakaze, nice to meet 'ya!
translation.1850826261: Sortie a fleet with at least 2 BBV to World 4-4 and defeat the boss
translation.3385985428: Seize Air Superiority on the Southern Sea Coral Islands!
translation.3820145921:
Ayanami-class destroyer Sazanami, Master.
You write it like this, but read it as 'Sazanami'.
translation.3283992230:
There is an enemy fleet patrolling off the Cam Ranh Peninsula.
Intercept them!
translation.4286795215:
Good morning. I am Takao.
It's great that you appear to be a model Admiral.
translation.1578307218:
Admiral, I'm Tanikaze!
I'll be in your care from now on.！
translation.653469309:
Hi, thanks for your time! I'm Aoba!
Could you spare a few words?!
translation.1660710113:
Construction and Development Pack
(Gives 7 Development Material)
translation.3374202276: Have a seaplane tender (AV) in your fleet.
translation.2249351741:
Yay~! I arrived-pyon! My name is Uzuki！,
you can call me U-chan!！
translation.1907321865:
Gives 1 Food Supply Ship Mamiya
(instant fatigue recovery for a whole fleet)
translation.2120577768:
Hi, I'm Yuudachi, a Shiratsuyu-class destroyer.
Nice to meet you!
translation.849733080:
Fourth ship of the Myoukou-class heavy cruisers, Haguro.
Together with everyone, I will support the front lines!
translation.552806214: Sortie the Remodeled Anti-Air Heavy Cruiser!
translation.3902164545: Prepare for Large Ship Construction! (Part B)
translation.1993263324:
Nice to meet you... Maruyu, reporting for duty.
Huh? You haven’t heard about me? How could that be...
translation.3899923341: Have Choukai, Aoba, Kinugasa, Kako, Furutaka, and Tenryuu in your main fleet.
translation.490198405: First Battle of the Solomon Sea
translation.1782910627: Deploy 2 submarines to 2-3, and score a victory at the boss.
translation.2076179807:
I'm Akatsuki!
Treat me like the fully-fledged lady I am!
translation.1136588853: Hatsuharu, Nenohi, Wakaba, Hatsushimo +2 extra ships to World 3-1, get S-Rank at Boss.
translation.332591074:
Seaplane tender Chiyoda here.
My older sister Chitose isn't bothering you, is she?
translation.1015723710:
Instant Construction Pack
(Gives 5 Fast Construcion Material)
translation.2336199001:
Lead ship of the Shiratsuyu-class destroyers, Shiratsuyu here!
Yes, the lead ship!
translation.3127250017: Deploy Furutaka, Kako, Aoba, Kinugasa to World 2-5, get S-Rank victory at the boss node.
translation.76346961: I'm... Hatsuyuki... Nice to meet you.
translation.2243733727:
Nice to meet you.
I'm Ayanami, a special class destroyer.
translation.3283187195: Opens a single construction or repair dock.
translation.579089260: Have Akashi as flagship in your main fleet.
translation.3957818941: You must reach the boss of 1-5 and achieve A-rank victory or above 10 times
translation.1242789428:
I'm Katsuragi, the third ship of the Unryuu-Class Carriers! Eh?
'A floating anti-air gun platform'?
I-It's not like that...! What are you saying!
translation.1056486267: We are executing Operation MO. Form a carrier battle group and crush the enemy task force!
translation.3286328934:
I'm Zuihou.
I'm a light aircraft carrier, but with some experience, I'll be as good as a regular carrier! Just you see!
translation.3601354047: Allows a ship to avoid being sank once.
translation.2304161168: Organize a small seek-and-destroy ASW fleet to clean up the submarine-infested waters near the naval base!
translation.2798558792: Beat the 2-3 boss with Choukai, Aoba, Kinugasa, Kako, Furutaka, and Tenryuu.
translation.1897430755: Good morning. Lebe is fine, yep.
translation.855607121: Have Abukuma, Akebono, Ushio, Kasumi, and Shiranui in your fleet.
translation.4225092515:
Cheers! I'm Suzukaze!
With me in your fleet, you won't have to worry about anything anymore!
translation.2868330708:
I'm the eighth Kagerou-class destroyer, Yukikaze!
I'll be in your care!
translation.4162891560: Perform 30 successful expeditions within the same week.
translation.580399665:
Kagerou-class Destroyer, Nowaki, reporting in.
Well, Commander. Let us proceed.
translation.757527326: Ise-class Aviation Battleship, Hyuuga. Moving forth.
translation.1836411980:
My name is Shikinami.
Let's get along.
translation.816584958:
Light cruiser Nagara here!
Please take good care of me!
translation.1347539765:
Good day, I'm Submarine Tender Taigei.
I may be inexperienced, but I am glad to be of service.
translation.3242708679: Organize a strong submarine fleet and advance a patrol line into the Middle Sea region. Locate enemy fleets and gradually destroy them!
translation.1144873475: Form an Aviation fleet with at least two Carriers and search the Northern Sea for the enemy positions!
translation.3123771776: Overwhelm the other admirals in training!
translation.2015541039: Restores fatigue to the entire fleet.
translation.641225628: Craft a piece of equipment. (Failures are OK)
translation.681575674:
Aircraft carrier Hiryuu here.
Leave the carrier battles to me. I can fight on in each and every adversity.
translation.1014920:
Akizuki-class anti-air destroyer, first ship, Akizuki.
I'm reporting in here. Please leave it to me!
translation.3246871142: I'm Furutaka. I'll be happy to show you the strengths of us heavy cruisers.
translation.3503715143:
The younger of the Fusou-class battleship sisters, Yamashiro here.
Umm, have you seen my sister Fusou?
translation.4081000153: Have 2 light cruisers in your fleet.
translation.2068527367: Hello, I'm Atago. Admiral, please remember it, okay?
translation.3023627783: Fusou, Michishio, Mogami, Shigure, Yamashiro +1 extra ship to World 5-1, get S-rank at Boss.
translation.3075266700:
I'm the destroyer Asashio.
Always ready for a challenge!
translation.995798335: Gives 1500 Steel, 200 Ammo, 200 Fuel, 200 Bauxite and 2 Development Materials
translation.1508470743: Defeat the Boss in 2-3 with a Level 90 - 99 Flagship. (S Rank)
translation.2168709481: Have a Level 90 - 99 Ship as your Flagship.
translation.2462785483: Deploy to World 1-1 and beat the boss.
translation.1886087435:
I'm the destroyer Shimakaze! I won't lose to anyone in speed.
Swiftly I go, like the island breeze.
translation.2512361458: Have an aircraft carrier as your flagship and 3 destroyers in your main fleet.
translation.1058299527:
U-Um... my name is Isonami.
Pleased to meet you.
translation.2443505616:
Second of the Agano-class light cruisers, Noshiro, has arrived.
Glad to meet you!
translation.2658791249:
I'm Hiei, Kongou's younger sister.
I look forward to gaining experience and getting closer to my sister's brilliance.
translation.2581050599:
Submarine U-511 of the German Navy,
please call me Yuu.
I've come a long way, so I'll be in your care...
translation.1749244876: Perform 15 successful modernizations within the same week.
translation.2263001951: Have Atago, Takao, Choukai, and Maya in your main fleet.
translation.4248442416:
Hmph, making me wait...
Second of the Yamato-class battleships, Musashi, has arrived!
translation.4210405222:
Gives 5 Food Supply Ship Irako
(boost morale for the whole fleet)
translation.592417170: Hold the Line at the Nansei Islands
translation.1233738620: Have ONLY Kasumi, Arare, Kagerou, and Shiranui in your fleet.
translation.1183565045:
Hello! Kagerou-class destroyer, Maikaze here!
I don't like it when it's gloomy outside!
translation.2021718272: A major enemy anchorage has been discovered deep in the northern sea. Sail out in an all-out attack to destroy it!
translation.1221805359:
Light cruiser, Tama here.
I'm not a cat, meow.
translation.827912953: Perform 3 successful expeditions within the same day.
